introTitle: Tap a meditation to start your personalized meditation

one.title: Customized Meditations
one.description: Receive a guided meditation recording that's been crafted just for you.

two.title: Wide Range of Topics
two.description: Whether you're looking for support in aligning with abundance, facing fear, releasing trauma, or even mindfulness.

three.title: Subscription Plans
three.description: Choose from one-time purchases, 3-month subscriptions, or monthly packs.
